TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but seconds after the contest is over ,and you win you stomach burst spilling it's content all over the stand.

I wish for a muffin made with atomic material.

Granted. As soon as you try to bite it, the muffin eats YOU!

I wish for some potato chips.

Granted. You receive computer chips made of potato (capable of providing itself with 1.6 volts of power!)

I wish I wasn't so tired after work.
Granted, but now you can't fall asleep again
I wish for the previous to wish a wish that I will answer

Granted, but now you can't fall asleep again

I wish MLP:FIM Never existed...wait, no MLP of any kind I mean.

Granted. Now all the fans kill you because they are angry that there isn't any show they liked was on

I wish for the above to wish before he did now (Look at last page)

Granted, but this causes a paradox or something, probably. Its the only proper explanation... right?

I wish that Nicholas Cage went insane and was kept in a padded CAGE in a mental hospital.
I wish for a falcon 9 v 1.1 mod that doesn't lagg my game hard enough to crash it instantly.

An Orignal Name: Granted. As for there can't be a cage in a cage it causes a paradox exploding the universe

DarthVader: Granted. You get it but because you didn't answer the previous you get shunned out of existance

I wish for this injury to go away

Granted, but the rest of your body is injured in the same way as the one you wish was gone.

I wish I was bilingual.

Granted, but no one understands your 2nd language.

I wish for a wobbly ship.

Granted, but... Wobbles itself apart and is destroyed... I guess... That was kind of crappy wish.

I wish for a stable ship with no wobble.

Granted, but they are too ridgid and can't expand with heating, and thus vaporize mid flight.

I wish

Granted, but

I wish for my friend to be home.

Granted, but upon saying hello he (she?) forgets who you are entirely.

I wish I had the waffle maker here with me.

Granted, but all the waffles you make are immediately burned to a crisp.

I wish we had KSP physics on earth.
Granted, danny decides to destroy the universe by crashing into jool.

Granted.

I wish for a paradox.

Granted, but it ceases to exist because you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one, but then you already had one and thus had no need to wish for it, which made you wish for one...

xÃ¢Ë†Å¾

I wish that I was a technopath.

Edited July 7, 2013 by Galacticruler

Granted, but... Wobbles itself apart and is destroyed... I guess... That was kind of crappy wish.

I wish for a stable ship with no wobble.

What I expected. Corrupt or not, that really is a crappy wish.

(above user) Granted, but the universe explodes. Ninja'd. Granted, but your wish didn't come true.

I wish for a corrupt wish.

Granted, but you used it already. Too bad.

I wish for a new computer (seriously I can't run KSP on this thing for 15 minutes without it shutting down )

Granted, but it turns out to be my computer which I quickly reacquire, leaving you with the one you have now.

I wish I could remove the power cable from my motherboard now that I finished breadboarding it...

Edit: Nevermind, got it

I now wish for dinner!

Edited July 8, 2013 by OrbitusII

Granted, but it is poisoned like EVERY OTHER WISH GRANT OF A FOOD RELATED WISH BLAAAAHHHHHH

I wish for LOTSA SPAGHETTI

Edited July 8, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted, but it is a great fing spaghetti monster.

I wish for $570
